title.rendered: Cash for Junk Cars in Chicago

content.rendered:
How long has the junk car in your garage or driveway been taking up space? We know all too well how easy it is to tell yourself you’ll get to it next week. But there’s no need to hold on to your junker for another day. With one phone call, you can get rid of your antique and free up the space in your home and your mind in one fell swoop!

Bring it to Aero Auto Parts, or let us get it for you! We buy junk cars with cash offerings! Whether you want it gone or want to know it’s going to the right place for others needing serviceable parts, we’ll take it off your hands. We offer free pick-up and transport services, so you know Aero Auto Parts is the perfect place to sell junk cars in Chicago.

Junk Car Removal

Aero Auto Parts is your go-to service center to sell junk cars and car parts. We’re happy to take that old beater off your hands.

We pay cash for all makes and models, so you never walk away empty-handed. You also don’t need to move a muscle. We pick it up at your location and bring it to our salvage yard free of charge. Free towing and paying cash for your junk car in Chicago, IL?

We prioritize customer service so selling your car is as easy as 1-2-3.

Junk Car Salvaging

Don’t just sell us your old car; let us help you find new parts! Aero Auto Parts is the place to go in Chicago if you need replacement parts and accessories. All it takes is one quick purchase and you’re on your way to restoring your classic hotrod.

We have everything your vehicle needs, such as

  • Doors
  • Replacement radiators
  • Air conditioners
  • Radios
  • Side mirrors
  • Front and rear bumpers
  • And much more!

In that case, our mechanics salvage the parts for resale to mechanics and vehicle owners looking who need them. Salvaging car parts saves more money than special ordering. It also reduces the amount of waste collected in landfills. To us, that’s a win-win.

Why Sell to Aero Auto Parts?

Aero Auto Parts has been buying junk vehicles for over 50 years. You hear that right: we give you money for junk cars in Chicago! Everyone deserves something for their old cars, so let us pay you for it. Even if you haven’t driven that junker in years, we’ll still take it off your hands.

There are many benefits to selling us that old automobile, like

  • Upfront Cash Payments: We pay cash on the spot at the values you deserve. You also don’t have to wait for deposits or checks. We make an instant offer on the spot.
  • We Come to You: You don’t have to bring that rusting car to us. We come to you, pick up the vehicle, and haul it away for free.
  • We Accept All Types of Vehicles: We accept all makes, models, and production years. We’ll never deny you based on the vehicle you sell, no matter what condition it’s in.
  • Help Someone In Need: With so many different car enthusiasts out there needing used auto parts, selling to us helps someone else. You may even find parts for your project car!

Importantly, if you sell your car and live in Chicago you must possess a valid legal title for all sales.

Contact Us Today!

At Aero Auto Parts, we’re the premier buyer of junk cars in the city. Bring your old vehicle to our salvage yard. Otherwise, contact us for junk car pickup in Chicago. If you’re a junk car buyer in Chicago, we have special offers to save you more money on car parts.

Call us at 773-483-2626, or you can even contact us online.
